job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Staff, Forward Deployed AI Engineer
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Such transformations are very time intensive and often risky. Tooling based on generative AI promises to accelerate these transformations in a way never seen before. Field Engineering is responsible for exploring the possibilities of Generative AI technologies and providing invaluable feedback to MongoDB's R&D teams to drive future capabilities of MongoDB and the MongoDB ecosystem.

   Application Modernization Field Engineers will work alongside project teams that are executing Application Modernisation projects with customers. The successful candidate will be responsible for evaluation, build, and applying tools in modernization projects, facilitating the usage of such tools and processes across the different project teams, identifying opportunities for tooling deployment, selecting potential 3rd party tools, contributing to the development of tooling prototypes and helping to shape the product roadmap., * Contribute to customer application modernization initiatives at any or all phases of the application lifecycle: assessment and analysis; planning and design; data modeling; application code conversion, development, test and build; integration and release configuration, production operations, application optimisation, and best practices adoption
     * Test drive MongoDB migration products to deliver on customer use cases and drive adoption of the product. Deliver concise feedback to the rest of the development organisation
     * Work closely with Product and Engineering teams to influence the direction of the MongoDB product roadmap
     * Personally execute well-defined, outcome-focused projects, POC, MVP and everything in between. POCs including developing or extending existing tools when necessary and appropriate for customer success, with an eye towards reusability and eventual integration with our products. These are often on premises at client locations
     * Maintain a broad and deep technical understanding of the product line and the underlying technologies and protocols
     * Work as part of a wider delivery team comprising consulting engineers from MongoDB Professional Services, project managers, and account teams
     * Assist sales teams in evaluating opportunities with prospects and customers
     * Willingness to work on site with customers for 7 days per month and to travel to Australia two weeks per year to collaborate with the Product development team

   Success Measures

   The Senior Application Modernization Engineer will be successful in this role when they can execute the following strategic tasks/responsibilities:
     * Become an expert level user of MongoDB, and our tools current migration products
     * Develop a playbook for customer application modernization engagements, in collaboration with other MongoDB Engineers, Product Management and Engineering
     * Communicate complex technical proposals simply and convincingly to a wide range of audiences
     * Provide unique insight into customer needs, product requirements and strategic opportunities by contributing experience from the field
     * Gain the reputation as a trusted advisor with our field teams and customers
     * Contribute to the success of customer application migration initiatives that they support
job_details.full_text:
Senior Staff, Forward Deployed AI Engineer

Such transformations are very time intensive and often risky. Tooling based on generative AI promises to accelerate these transformations in a way never seen before. Field Engineering is responsible for exploring the possibilities of Generative AI technologies and providing invaluable feedback to MongoDB's R&D teams to drive future capabilities of MongoDB and the MongoDB ecosystem.

   Application Modernization Field Engineers will work alongside project teams that are executing Application Modernisation projects with customers. The successful candidate will be responsible for evaluation, build, and applying tools in modernization projects, facilitating the usage of such tools and processes across the different project teams, identifying opportunities for tooling deployment, selecting potential 3rd party tools, contributing to the development of tooling prototypes and helping to shape the product roadmap., * Contribute to customer application modernization initiatives at any or all phases of the application lifecycle: assessment and analysis; planning and design; data modeling; application code conversion, development, test and build; integration and release configuration, production operations, application optimisation, and best practices adoption
     * Test drive MongoDB migration products to deliver on customer use cases and drive adoption of the product. Deliver concise feedback to the rest of the development organisation
     * Work closely with Product and Engineering teams to influence the direction of the MongoDB product roadmap
     * Personally execute well-defined, outcome-focused projects, POC, MVP and everything in between. POCs including developing or extending existing tools when necessary and appropriate for customer success, with an eye towards reusability and eventual integration with our products. These are often on premises at client locations
     * Maintain a broad and deep technical understanding of the product line and the underlying technologies and protocols
     * Work as part of a wider delivery team comprising consulting engineers from MongoDB Professional Services, project managers, and account teams
     * Assist sales teams in evaluating opportunities with prospects and customers
     * Willingness to work on site with customers for 7 days per month and to travel to Australia two weeks per year to collaborate with the Product development team

   Success Measures

   The Senior Application Modernization Engineer will be successful in this role when they can execute the following strategic tasks/responsibilities:
     * Become an expert level user of MongoDB, and our tools current migration products
     * Develop a playbook for customer application modernization engagements, in collaboration with other MongoDB Engineers, Product Management and Engineering
     * Communicate complex technical proposals simply and convincingly to a wide range of audiences
     * Provide unique insight into customer needs, product requirements and strategic opportunities by contributing experience from the field
     * Gain the reputation as a trusted advisor with our field teams and customers
     * Contribute to the success of customer application migration initiatives that they support

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the exploration and application of Generative AI technologies to accelerate application modernization. Key responsibilities include evaluating, building, and applying tools, developing tooling prototypes, and influencing product roadmaps, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile's focus on developing and deploying applications built on generative models. While there's mention of data modeling and application code conversion, the core theme revolves around leveraging GenAI for transformation and feedback to R&D, rather than traditional predictive modeling or pure software development.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'evaluation, build, and applying tools in modernization projects' directly relates to the process of creating or adapting models/tools, and 'contributing to the development of tooling prototypes' indicates hands-on model development.
job_tasks.phrase: evaluation, build, and applying tools in modernization projects

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'developing or extending existing tools when necessary and appropriate for customer success' implies the creation or modification of AI-related tools, which falls under modeling.
The phrase 'application code conversion, development, test and build' refers to traditional software engineering tasks involved in modernizing applications.
job_tasks.phrase: application code conversion, development, test and build

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'integration and release configuration, production operations, application optimisation', which are core software development and deployment activities.
job_tasks.phrase: integration and release configuration, production operations, application optimisation

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'exploring the possibilities of Generative AI technologies' and providing 'feedback to MongoDB's R&D teams to drive future capabilities', indicating an understanding of business context and aligning technology with product strategy.
job_tasks.phrase: exploring the possibilities of Generative AI technologies and providing invaluable feedback to MongoDB's R&D teams

job_tasks.justification: The responsibility to 'Work closely with Product and Engineering teams to influence the direction of the MongoDB product roadmap' shows alignment with business and product strategy.
job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with Product and Engineering teams to influence the direction of the MongoDB product roadmap

job_tasks.justification: The task of 'Assist sales teams in evaluating opportunities with prospects and customers' requires understanding business needs and customer requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: Assist sales teams in evaluating opportunities with prospects and customers

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'production operations' directly relates to the maintenance and management of systems in a production environment, a key aspect of MLOps.
The mention of 'POC, MVP and everything in between' refers to the development of prototypes and minimum viable products, which are software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: POC, MVP and everything in between

soft_skills.phrase: Communicate complex technical proposals simply and convincingly to a wide range of audiences
evaluation, build, and applying tools in modernization projects
Maintain a broad and deep technical understanding of the product line and the underlying technologies and protocols
Work as part of a wider delivery team
Gain the reputation as a trusted advisor
